tool_description: Introducing our National Registered Homeless Shelters API for the United States, featuring an extensive and up-to-date database of homeless shelters across the country.

api_list.name: By Zip Code
api_list.description: Search Homeless Shelters by Zip Code

required_parameters.name: zipcode
required_parameters.description: The zip code to search for homeless shelters.

api_list.name: By State & City
api_list.description: Search Homeless Shelters by State & City

required_parameters.name: state
required_parameters.description: The full name or abbreviation of the state (e.g., Washington or WA).

required_parameters.name: city
required_parameters.description: The name of the city to search for homeless shelters.

api_list.name: By Location
api_list.description: Search Homeless Shelters by Location Coordinate and Radius

required_parameters.name: radius
required_parameters.description: The search radius in miles (maximum 10 miles).
